content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
Hey! My day is going well thanks! How about yours?
It's going pretty good. I'm just relaxing at home, watching Grey's Anatomy.
Oh, nice! I love that show. I'm actually a writer myself, so I love to watch shows like that for inspiration.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a writer, but I don't think I have the patience.
It definitely takes a lot of patience, but it's so rewarding when you finish a project.
I can imagine! What kind of fiction do you write?
I write mostly fantasy and sci-fi, but I'm also working on a historical novel.
That's so cool! I love fantasy and sci-fi.
Do you have any books published?
Not yet, but I'm working on it!
That's awesome! Good luck with everything!
